title: Working with Shell Variables
description: In this lab, you will learn how to work with shell variables. Shell variables are used to store data in shell scripts, and they can hold various types of values such as numbers, characters, or strings. Shell variables are created by assigning a value to them using the = sign.

meta.title: Mastering Shell Variables: A Comprehensive Guide
meta.description: Explore the power of shell variables and learn how to create, reference, and manage them effectively in your shell scripts.
